outputs.output_descr: The project is focussed in Orissa to strengthen the capacity of the Panchayat representatives; functionaries and other department officials in the state for improved governance and also intends to setup a structure for standardizing the training and capacity building of the Panchayati Raj Institutions in the state of Orissa. To undertake systematic documentation of best practices, processes adopted and lessons learned  to facilitate and replicate capacity building exercises in future.

project_descr: Capacity Building of Panchayati Raj Institutions in Orissa.
project_title: Capacity Building of Panchayati Raj Institutions
